root.str: Adds 25 rounds to the default magazine size.
There are three abandoned Amp Stations on Esamir: Elli Amp Station to the south, Nott Amp Station to the east, and an unnamed base north of Saerro Listening Post.
Could not disband the squad because you are not the squad leader.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> This is the garage of the newly constructed Containment Site. Defending the facility becomes considerably more difficult when enemy vehicles breach this location.
Increases the weapon's reload speed by 2%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 560 rounds.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.75 seconds and reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 25 meters.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Galaxy down to 9.5 minutes.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 42 rounds.
Thank you, acolyte. This information will be invaluable to us. No doubt our enemies are gathering this data as well. Disrupt their efforts.
Adds the LC2 Bumpers to your Lightning.

Upon detonation, the Flash Grenade will temporarily blind, deafen, and reduce the accuracy of infantry within its blast radius, making it perfect for breaching crowded rooms.

3 second fuse.
[*target*] was not found. Couldn't send squad invitation.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
The [*faction*] has linked to the southern warpgate +[*points*] VP!
Applies a decal to your vehicle. Available for all factions.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 13.125%
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
This customization adds a L337 decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
Apply the single use Indar Scrub camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Apply the Black Flames camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Nanite Systems' HS/NV scope has no magnification, but provides high contrast outlines to nearby objects and illuminates nearby soldiers.
<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> This lab must have been abandoned when the facility flooded, however I don't see any way out. Where are all of the researchers?
Secondary: Pistol: NS Pistol placeholder name
Reduces cooldown between placements of Spitfire Auto-Turret.
Increases the speed of entering and exiting Sprint Mode
While cloaked the infiltrator can sprint faster, but will take 50% more damage
Nanoweave Armor is capable of absorbing more damage than its standard issue counterpart
Grants access to a consumable medical kit that can be used to instantly restore the users health.
The Banded Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. TR use only.2957174824 ucdn
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Apply the Flame camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Apply the single use Pine Forest camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 495 rounds.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Gladiator Fins. All factions can use this gear.
Get the most popular Liberator weapons at a discounted price!
Use the Neutralizer on the disabled vehicle and drive it to your Warpgate
Uplink Established -- Orbital Strike Inbound -- CLEAR THE AREA
Changes color of the cockpit glass to Auraximas Green. VS use only.
Allows the user to carry and place an additional anti-personnel mine or two additional anti-tank mines.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 27 shells.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> The suits don't trust Nanite Systems, and I can't say I blame them. Help them build, sure, but make sure we're the ones looking over their shoulders.
Apply the One-Year Anniversary camo pattern to your armor.
<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> You have been asked to only target Biolabs that are under attack, as it will help prevent suspicion and provide plausible deniability of your actions.

It has become increasing clear that the chaotic energies roiling up from beneath the permafrost must be contained at key locations in order to prevent a second collapse. Representative Foster has sent you back to Esamir to help secure and survey where the new Containment Sites will eventually be constructed.
Help your team win by eliminating the enemy spawn point! Destroy enemy deployed Sunderers!
The T16 Rhino was designed as a squad support weapon that remains accurate, even during sustained fire. TR use only.
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the ANT. VS use only.
Adds 4 rounds to the default magazine size.
Use Join Combat from the Map screen

Allows the Prowler to deploy which increases the reload speed of the primary weapon by 24% and projectile speed by 30% but the Prowler is unable to move. The Prowler must not be moving to engage deployment.
The duration the cloak can remain active is increased to 8.5 seconds and the charge time when depleted is decreased to 11 seconds; additionally the small arms damage resist is increased to 35%.
Apply the single use Esamir Ice camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Alright friendo, just sit tight. This won't take but a moment.
Reduces damage taken from frag grenades, common explosions, tank mines, and C4 by 50%; and infantry rockets, light anti-vehicle, and air-to-ground explosives by 20%.
Restores 125 health per second to allied aircraft within 75 meters and allied ground vehicles within 50 meters, and does not affect the Galaxy itself.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Manta Ray Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
The Terran Republic has defended Hvar!
Attaches a 3x optical zoom to your weapon.

InfilOptics released the IO-12 as the ultimate in telescopic gun sights. It features 12x magnification and a standard mil-dot reticle.

Hold Sprint to steady aim.

The Proximity Radar certification for the Harasser has been removed from the Utility slot and certification points have been refunded. Proximity Radar is now available as a Defense slot certification and can be repurchased there.
Allows the user to carry and place one additional anti-tank mine. Rank 2 allows for one additional anti-personnel mine, or two additional anti-tank mines.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Analysts have logged an issue with the recently deployed Containment Sites. Unfortunately, this was uncovered after deploying the facility and has been exploited by saboteurs.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "Y" Gold Hood Ornament.

Unlock the chapter and embark on %0.
To preview the chapter CLICK HERE.
<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly</font> Alright soldier, that should be enough. Your bretheren are still in the field if you want to help harvest, but I'll be in Sanctuary when you're ready to deliver.

Provides one-time access to the Colossus Tank without the use of Outfit Resources.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Apply the Desert Scrub v1 camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 2250 rounds.
The smart-choke tightens pellet spread when firing while aimed by 0.5, but decreases spread when firing from hip by 0.5.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 192 rounds.
Kill enemies using any Valkyrie Nose Gun.
Earned by being the Sunderer driver when a passenger kills an enemy.
Increases zoom, but also increases aiming time.
Your petition has been sent to [*guild*].
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 900 rounds.
Illuminate the battlefield with these front-facing Floodlights for your Sunderer. All factions can use this gear.
Designed for raw power, this gold plated variant of the Decimator is unmatched in its destructive potential against enemy vehicles and infantry. All factions can use NS weapons.

A festive blue cap featuring the New Conglomerate's logo.
+50% xp when worn
This item is only usable during the winter holiday season.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 400 rounds.
Get a selection of ANT weapons and cosmetics at a discounted price! TR only.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Could not set the squad recruitment description at this time.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 480 rounds.
Apply the single use Sandy Scrub camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
The region information panel reports which facility benefits are active in the region.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 320 rounds.
This is really a win-win situation here.
The Sea Lion underwater rifle fires slowly with more impact per shot, a favorite of Nascent operatives who value their ammunition supply. <font color="#dc9c36">Can fire while submerged.</font>
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Gold Venril Sathir Bust Hood Ornament.
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Scrub camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 9 shells.
Apply the 艾美瑞什 Grassland camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Customize your Flash with the Rail Guard. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 80 rockets.
The S12 Renegade is an effective shotgun that is lethal to soft targets at close range. All factions can use this weapon.
Destroy enemies at Staging Site Alpha, Bravo, or Charlie
This action is not available at this time. Please try again later.
Celebrate the Fifth Anniversary of PlanetSide 2 with this decal. This decal can be applied to armor.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 175 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Are you sure you want to disband your outfit?
Large wall with no windows that once fully constructed can withstand a moderate amount of damage.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Magrider. VS use only.
Applies an nVidia Decal to your vehicle.
Increases zoom, but also increases aiming time.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Doubt is a powerful tool, and we have sown the seeds among our foes. We will continue to refine this effective technology, and make you aware of the results when we are complete.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Liberator by 900 seconds.
Heavy Assault: Kill a Light Assault, Heavy Assault, Heavy Weapons, Infiltrator, Medic, Engineer and Sniper
A Supply Convoy can leave from your warpgate every 30 minutes
Creates a long lasting smoke screen around the Sunderer that disrupts visibility and lock-ons for 9 seconds.
Increases Sticky Grenade capacity to three
Deploys an Anti-Infantry Phalanx turret that may be manned by allied players.
Increases the range and duration that soldiers can be resupplied by the ammunition pack
When you are ready, interact with the podium in front of you.
Adds 12 rounds to the default magazine size.2976724122 ucdn
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 32 missiles.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Flying Bullet Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
Increases nanite gain by 50% for 1 Day. Boost can only be used on this character.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your Infiltrator. TR use only.
A portion of your membership subsidizes developer cup soup rations.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Applies one-way shields to the openings of nearby structures, protecting defenders within. Requires a nearby Silo to power the module.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Ah, there's the researcher. She's not looking too good. You should see what you can find out while you can.
Earned by being the ANT driver when a passenger kills an enemy.
Taking fall damage will cloak you for 2.5 seconds. Additionally, bailing from an ejection seat aircraft will cloak you for 6 seconds upon hitting the ground. Firing a weapon will reveal you.
Complete Master Basic Directive or earn Battle Rank 10
What would we do without you? Nothing, I guess.
This customization adds a Tan decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.
Further increases the size of the Overcloak Device's capacitor.
A standardized reflex sight designed to promote faster precision aiming.
Thanks for your interest in improving your gaming experience. Please select the area in which we can be of the most assistance.
The Prowler is the Terran Republic's main battle tank. It is a fast tank with a dual cannon for maximum firepower.
Generates a dense mesh of nanites around the soldier that decays slowly while active, and absorbs up to 450 damage before failing. Regenerates to full in 28 seconds.
Squad leaders can earn Drill Sergeant Ribbons for every battle rank a new player earns in their squad. Help out the new players!
Adds 2 rounds to the default magazine size.
Firing in short bursts will help you control your weapon more easily, and land shots where you want them.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 11.25%
Allows for the creation of a single flash personal atv in the outfitwars game mode. Usable from the home base vehicle terminals by those who have outfit permission to use the item.
Apply the Dazzle Dizzy camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 90 grenades.
Further increases the size of the Nano-Efficient Cloak's capacitor.
Customize your Sunderer and tear up the roads of Auraxis with these tire spikes. All factions can use this gear.
The deploy location is out of bounds
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 900 rounds.
Proficiency with the Heavy Assault class.
Unlocks access to LMGs. Does not include Directive reward weapons. Engineer only.
Kill enemies that are wearing a Halloween mask with the NS CandyCannon 3000.Completing this directive awards the title "the Trickster"
This is the default scope for rocket launchers
You're ready to join the fight, but before you go, you should speak with your faction representative on Sanctuary for their last bit of guidance.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 64 rockets.
This customization adds a Teal decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Apply the Wave camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Allows the Infiltrator to use the Proximity mine
A generous group of civilians has donated this extra lifewear in support of a greater good.
Apply the single use Indar Dunes camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
It's our anniversary, and we're having a sale to celebrate!
Apply the single use Digital camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
You are about to purchase: %0. Are you sure?
Reduces the acquire timer of the Harasser by 420 seconds.
VS - Heavy Pistol - Mid - V1 Description(Delete Me -BB)
The jump key is used to hurdle battlefield obstacles.

War is a costly endeavor, especially for ammunition and the lack therof. The Sunderer, being the versatile machine it is, can be used to remedy this current and never-ending reality of war. Use the Sunderer to transport ammo to our allies at our front lines!
Unlocks access to EMP Grenades. Engineer only.
Applies a camo to your armor, weapon, or vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Request denied - the match does not exist.
Apply the Wave camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
The straight-pull bolt allows the sniper to chamber another round while aiming down sights.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.45 seconds.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Sunderer by 540 seconds.

Facilitator Campner has been spending his leisure time playing an old Earth game called checkers, and would enjoy a physical game set. Representative Ayla of Nanite Systems has an excellent record of obtaining obscure objects and may prove to be useful in acquiring one.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.

Light Assaults can use Carbines which retain a portion of their accuracy while airborne. They also have access to Submachine Guns, and Shotguns.



Unique to the Light Assault is the Rocklet Rifle. The 6-round Rocklet Rifle fires light explosive mini-rockets, giving the Light Assault the versatility to engage vehicles. It can fire semi-auto or unload all rocklets in rapid succession.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly</font> Listen up, soldier. We've got some weeding that needs done around The Shattered Warpgate area.
Battle experience also earns you resources. The type of resource earned is determined by which territory you are in.
PlanetSide: Arena goes to Early Access.

<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> So, keep your eyes peeled for the remains of our fallen heroes. Make a note of their position and collect their dog tags. We owe it to them to recover their remains and remember their names.
Next rank lowers cooldown. Can be activated once every 46 seconds.
Allows the user to carry and place two additional bricks of C-4.
A 3.4x zoom scope useful when engaging targets at greater distances.
Support Planetside 2 and get awesome benefits!
Allows squad leaders to request empire-wide offensive and defensive support by placing markers on the continent map.
You can now wield the soundtrack of failure. Apply liberally to your fallen foes. All factions can use this item.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> The heat signature is coming from that crashed weather drone. Powerful storms may still be prevalent even after dissipating Oshur's energy barrier.

Embracing ancient Vanu technology, VS weapons and vehicles are the most exotic on the battlefield.Handheld VS weapons have small power sources instead of magazines, and shoot plasma rounds, making them well-rounded and accurate.Their main battle tank, the <font color="#c27fff">Magrider</font>, makes use of hover technology allowing it to glide smoothly over rough terrain.Heavy weapons like the <font color="#c27fff">Lasher</font> and the vehicle-mounted <font color="#c27fff">Particle Accelerator</font> fire spheres of charged energy that fire rapidly and explode on impact.The handheld <font color="#c27fff">Lancer</font> fires a highly accurate anti-vehicle plasma rail that requires a short charge-up before firing.

Auraxis Prior

While each empire uses a unique command hierarchy to organize and enact battlefield strategy, what all empires do equally is decentralize their information gathering and delivery methods as much as possible.
By using couriers, civilians, and soldiers of varying rank and status, the damage that traitors, spies, data breaches, and lost information can do is limited.
The Wayland Long Range Optic is easily configured for various magnifications. This optic amplifies magnification by 12x.
Applies a camo to your armor, weapon, or vehicle. Only usable by VS.
Apply the Grey camo pattern to your armor.
Apply the Honeycomb camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
Apply the single use Snow Aspen Forest camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Today Only! Solid Green Camo Available!
Apply the single use Desert Scrub v1 camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Welcome to Oshur, soldier. This place has a lot to teach us. And the Terran Republic sure wanted to get back here in a hurry. We should find out why.

Must wield melee weapon to collect. Hold quick melee button down to wield melee weapon.

Collection credit is shared with nearby allies.

Look around the Shattered Warpgate region for plant specimens identified by the Analysis HUD implant. There should be plants throughout the region as well as clusters that spring up and spawn rapidly.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Mosquito Inertial Dampener - Level 2
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 900 rounds.
Adds 50 rounds to the default magazine size.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Hey, soldier. We need combat trained pilots. Fly to the specified areas and deploy additional Storm Buoys or clear out any enemy aircraft that may threaten the research.
Too far or too close from Orbital Strike Generator
Earn Outfit Wars score to increase your ranking.
You can keep players from sending you messages by typing /ignore playername.
Apply the single use Pine Forest camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Adds 1 rocket to the default magazine size.
Apply the single use African Forest camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> I've got the first key, the second you'll have to swipe from the facility I've marked on your map, and the last one, well that one is a bit more complicated.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 26 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.
Increases the speed at which an Infiltrator can hack enemy equipment terminals by 40%.
Advanced Shield Capacitors allow damaged and depleted shields to recharge sooner.
Refined material construction removes the innate hipfire movement speed penalty, reduces the movement speed penalty while aiming by 50%, and increases the weapon's angular recoil by 33%.
Applies a PlanetSide 1 Decal to your armor.
Mousing over a region brings up a details panel about that region.
<font color="#00FFAA">Festive Drone:</font> Merry Auraximas, human. Another gift awaits you tomorrow.

Congratulations, you have now succesfully Redeployed to the Warpgate. Remember Redeploy can be used to transport yourself to any Waypoint (green circles on the map during Redeploy), or even certain vehicles (Appear Green).
Applies a camo to your armor, weapon or vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Designates the wearer as an honorary member of the Black Market smugglers.
<font color="#00FFAA">Giga Carrot: </font> One day we will break free of this place and bring down upon you and your people a righteous fury that will burn hotter than the brightest star.
Attach a spoiler to the vehicle.

This uplink structure can unleash a devastating attack from orbit. When powered and charged, any target in range can be designated using a tool obtained from the uplink terminal. Longer distance strikes cost additional charge, so frequent or long distance attacks will require longer term defense of the structure.

Unlocks the Auxiliary Spitfire Turret for your tactical loadout slot. These are resupplied using Merit points.

Single use consumable. Max 2 between resupplies.
Deployable turret identical to an engineer Spitfire Auto-Turret. Only one Aux Spitfire can be active at a time. An engineer can place their standard spitfire and one Aux Spitfire at the same time.
Adds 12 rounds to the default magazine size.
Potential earnings with All Access Membership
Could not transfer leadership to that player.
The Map is a key tool for observing the current state of the war. There are a number of functions available to you from the map, including placing waypoints and finding battle hotspots.
Switch to your side arm. This is usually faster than reloading your primary weapon.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 56 rounds.
Apply the Pixelate camo pattern to your armor.
Unlock defense slot Certifications to increase the Scythe's survivability on the field. Defense slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Path would lead through the central mountain. Must plot course around
Unlock range attachments to alter your weapon with
Vehicle cannot be deployed here because [*reason*]
<font color="#00FFAA">Coordinator Tolland:</font> Hey, kid. The boys are still out on expedition. Stop by when they get back.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.

Mentor Rating is increased when earning Mentor Ribbons, and decays naturally over time.

This stat is intended to promote players who actively help new players become more acclimated to the game by providing tutilage and support.

Your rating tier is shown when creating Mentor squads in the squad finder.

A rating of 500 or higher allows access to the /mentor channel while above BR15.
Contains a AF-4A Bandit plus 1000 Certs

The Harasser is an agile 3 man buggy that is available to all empires. The driver and gunner are both seated inside the cockpit; while the third passenger stands on the rear of the buggy and has access to his own weapons.

This training program will take about 15 minutes to complete. It teaches the following topics:- Movement- Capturing facilities- Resupplying / changing classes- Using weapons and equipment- Redeploying / respawning- Creating / using vehicles- Shields and generators- Changing continents- Getting into the action
Get back out there and continue the fight. Also if we could lock out the other empires for a time, it would also give our non combatant researchers a chance to get onto the field.

Designed as a longer range option to the standard TriGon, the TG-8 features increased 8x magnification and mil-dot sighting.

Hold Sprint to steady aim.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Greetings operative, Esamir clearly needs our help. Please ready your Engineer equipment and advance to the nearest allied Containment Site.
Reduce overheat damage done to the vehicle caused by firing the primary weapon while MAD or deployed into Skylance Battery mode by 20%
<font color="#00FFAA">Dolan:</font> This anchor may be defective, as I'm sure no one anticipated the detonation.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 45 rockets.
This armor can only be worn by TR Infiltrators.
Our Depot has everything that you need, and even more that you want.
Increases the vertical thrust speed of the Mosquito by 30KPH.
The weather is warm, the sun is shining, the battles are raging, and the deals are hot.

Activate consuming 500 cortium and for the next 15 seconds main cannon shots do 32% more damage, fly 50% faster and can pierce vehicles. Each shot however will overheat the weapon's cooling system inflicting up to 500 damage to the Colossus.
Cannot activate while deployed.
Engineers are demolitions experts that can drop ammunition resupply packs, create deployable turrets, and repair vehicles, objectives, and MAXes.
Increases the vertical thrust speed of the Reaver by 10KPH.

Awarded for mastery of the Liberator, this Auraxium-infused Lumifiber trim is proof of its owner's ability in a gunship. NSO only. <font color="#dc9c36">Color of trim changes based on your current faction.</font>
That will make them think twice.
Increases the speed at which your shields regenerate to full by 33%.
Illuminates low light levels up to 1000 meters in a green monochrome display.
All Valkyrie weapons certifications have been reset and their cert costs refunded, they may be purchased again at any time.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Excellent work, enlightened one. Due to your efforts we have been able to successfully triangulate the origin of the signal. How... peculiar. It seems to be coming from "Desolation." An asteroid.
Increases the Javelin's top speed and acceleration, and increases afterburner fuel recharging speed by 30%.
Apply the single use Desert Scrub v1 camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> The Botany Wing is dedicated to studying the vegetation discovered after the warpgate's destruction. The plant's growth rate is influenced by the tempest energy gathered here.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 25 shells.
Unlock the NS-66 Punisher with a full complement of attachments. All factions can use NS weapons.
You are not allowed inside the Terran Republic embassy.
Increases the top speed of the Lightning by 2 KPH.
Deleting Credit Card From File, Please Wait...

<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> We have added one additional location to your map. This signature is much larger than the others, but weaker as well. Investigate this last area before returning.
Be the first to obtain 200 units of Relic Energy. Capture Active Vanu Relics to get Relic Energy over time.

Labeled a "heavy" shotgun, the slow-firing HSG-400 can down close-range infantry targets in a single shot. While magazine size is limited, the weapon still takes advantage of a standard mag-fed reload system. NSO use only.
Kill enemies using any Magrider Top Gun.
The Air to Ground Missiles are ideal for engaging ground targets
Adds 6 round to the default magazine size.
Hold [%s] to turn off Tempest Siphon
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Survey area alpha located. While in the noted area, use the "aim" function of the Signal Scanner to deploy the relay.

When activated, a rapidly decaying shield mesh surrounds the soldier and absorbs up to 450 damage; power is recharged by 31% when the operating soldier kills an enemy. This shield passively recharges to full over 36 seconds.
A standardized reflex sight designed to promote faster precision aiming.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> The heat signature appears to originate from beneath your position. Continue below to investigate the source.

Auto-spots enemies who damage or kill you if they are not using a suppressed weapon.
Uses 0.75 energy per second.

DEV NOTE: We intend to make this effect work in a vehicle and reduce spot time.
Failed to remove the squad from the platoon.

Released as a commemorative edition of the NC's wildly successful foray into electromagnetic weaponry, the NC1 Gauss Rifle, the Gauss Prime marksman assault rifle can effortlessly drop distant targets.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Interesting. There must not have been enough power to assemble the aircraft. This gives us a vague location for the researcher who fled the flooded base. And that location is on Oshur. Take to the skies and find them.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
While deployed, the Prowler gains 17.5% additional front armor, and a hardlight rampart is projected outward. Damage to this projection also damages the Prowler.

The VLG fires a laser guided missile that seeks toward the gunner's crosshairs. The missile is effective against armor on direct hits and produces a moderate blast. Missile will detonate after traveling 400 meters. All factions can use this weapon.
Apply the Woodland camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
This customization adds a Smiley Face decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 80 rounds.
Unlock defense slot Certifications to increase the Flash ATV's survivability on the field. Defense slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> As part of the standard requisition process you would collect the item from one of our courteous vendors; however, this mission has been flagged with an emergency authorization code, so I have been told to immediately send you the schematic for the buoy.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Download complete. Preliminary work has begun on the data. Look around if you wish, but you will need to redeploy to escape the underground lab.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 25 rockets.
Increases the speed at which your shields recharge to full by 33%, and reduces the delay before your shield begins recharging by 1 second.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Vanguard to 11 minutes.
Variant of the Standard Vanu Sovereignty Light Assault Helmet.
When you perform well, and follow orders, we will allot you with Certification Points. These will allow you to requisit equipment upgrades and new weaponry.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Scythe to 15 minutes.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 36 rounds.

Space Pumpkins are appearing throughout Auraxis in the month of October! Destroy Space Pumpkins for seeds, use seeds to purchase holiday items!

You have a separate set of equipment loadouts in this area that do not affect your normal loadouts.

All weapons for infantry and vehicles available to your empire can be used.

All vehicle upgrades, suit upgrades, abilities, and weapon attachments are available and always set to maximum rank regardless of your actual certifications

Vehicles and MAX suits do not cost resources.

Vehicles and MAX suits do not require or start acquisition timers

Player stats are not recorded while in this area.

Experience and medals cannot be earned here.

Players cannot hurt each other but can hurt themselves

Shooting or destroying friendly target dummies does not grant grief points, but will still show the grief indicator and play the grief sound.

Weapon trials cannot be obtained while in this area.
